overview:
BluHornÂ® LLC is an advertising software firm developed to meet the needs of industry professionals and academic institutions for the advancement of their media buying strategies. The software takes the daily complex operations of media buying/ad agency functions and simplifies them in a streamlined, time saving and cost efficient manner.

BluHorn SolutionsÂ® was programmed using the skill of those highly knowledgeable of industry operations, insight and expertise to assist any advertising agency, in-house marketing department or academic institution to reach a higher level of performance.
